message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really think the product is worth more than $95.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
